acidity.notes: Juicy. I can see how the coffee is said to have a 'plum' tasting note.

finish.notes: Tea-like on swallow. Dark sensation lingering on sides of tongue.

flavor: First sensation is of how sweet the fruit note is. Fruit is definitely a stone fruit, like a peach, cherry, or plum. It's almost overwhelming but not. One of the sweetest cups I've had so far. Finish is tea-like with a lingering warmth.
notes: 8 second bloom swirl with 60g of water. This drawdown was identical to the last, but it pushes the fruit note forward more in this cup. Not sure which one I like better.
actionItem: Make one more cup at 22, then try 23 again to compare profiles.
